channel.title: Ring of Wealth
channel.description:
Can anyone give me the code to add the ring of wealth to my Delta server?
I wanted the ring of wealth to basically do what it does on actual runescape, slightly increase drop rates.
I have searched and searched, I can't seem to find it. I would appreciate it thanks.

item.title: Ring of Wealth
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Go to where your drop rates are processed for npcs, make a check if they’re wearing ring. Increase by 25%.

Read full topic
